workflow.title: Setting an attribute value in a specific Example
workflow.description: This process will first generate an artificial dataset and tag it with ids.Then a Filter Examples Operator is used to get a dataset with exactly one example identified by it's id. Then a value is set in this example.Since the change in the data will be reflected in all views of the example set, a simply copy is passed by to the process' output. If you take a look at the attributes of the example with id 5, you will find the 12 there.
